thread.title: No Fresh Towels or Sheets
thread.title_full: No Fresh Towels or Sheets - Review of Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Edyth-Anne
title: No Fresh Towels or Sheets
text:
If you don't need fresh towels every two or three days, don't mind mold in the bathroom, fresh sheets every few days, or dryers that don't work then this is the place for you!
the staff was wonderful, the room was clean, but after a few days, just like in your own home, you would expect some sort of cleaning service.
Room Tip: DO NOT use the laundry! you can pay for cleaning if you like added to the already steep price of the... See more room tips
